span.style: color: rgb(54, 54, 54); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; line-height: 17px;

description.span: Able to replace multiple instruments, EVM-7 can simultaneously measure and log particulates (mass concentration), VOCs, toxic gas, CO2, relative humidity, and temperature. Air velocity may also be measured via optional accessory. While dial-in impactor allows for accelerated selection of particulate settings without disassembly, built-in sampling pump assists in collection of particulates. Real-time measurement is ensured via light scattering photometer mass concentration engine.
